entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • React/Redux/ASP.Net Core templates for .Net 6.0 #44830
  • Default Blazor project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 6.0.11 package #44828
  • [Epic]: Analyzers for Minimal APIs + MVC #44824
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Simplify CORS for Minimal APIs #44823
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Hot Reload /hot restart features (e.g. top-level statements, modifying route mappings, DI, etc.)[ ] Improve error messages for optional parameters and `TryParse` failures: Support custom error messages when validation fails on minimal APIs #35501 #44822
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Provide capability for route debugging #44821
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server On Connection Authentication #44820
  • InputFile not working on Blazor Desktp in winform #44818
  • NRE in Kestrel Telemetry EventSources #44817

Closed

  • Blazor linking/trimming issue in RemoteAuthenticationService: "System.NotSupportedException: ConstructorContainsNullParameterNames" #44811
  • System.IO.IOException: 'Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #44650
  • Kestrel: Support for multiple transports, side-by-side #44537
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic]: Analyzers for Minimal APIs + MVC #36637
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic] OpenAPI in .NET 7 #37098
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic]: Minimal APIs enhancements #39327
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Epic]: Configuring minimal APIs for auth should be suitably simple & featured #34545
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic]: MVC Enhancements #39338
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Epic] Route Groups #41433
    7.0.0
  • AuthZ: Add IAuthorizationRequirementData #44551
    8.0-preview1
  • CascadingValue ignoring element's razor definition #43750
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server - Windows Authentication Type is not built/initialized during project creation #38360
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perform a pass cleaning up the web templates #30162
    .NET 8 Planning
  • service-worker-assets wrong content when using StaticWebAssetBasePath in hosted scenario #44678
    .NET 8 Planning
  • event handler cause render even nothing need to render #44812
  • [Blazor] CustomElement affects the results of MarkupString #44785

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `3026483` #44816
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `394fc42` to `727c0ed` #44815
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `3026483` #44814
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.12 #44827
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.12
  • Update branding to 3.1.32 #44826
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.32
  • Enable CA1854 #44799
    Perf, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Support side-by-side transports in Kestrel #44657
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER workaround #44808
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1
  • !fixup! Correct CodeQL3000 setup #44809
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #44768
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Backport 'Fix NavigationLock throwing a JSDisconnectedException on browser close in Blazor Server' #44806
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2034193 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44767
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #33622 #44771
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
